resources.string: AppLink allows you to open some link to the most popular social network directly in the official Android application instead of open the browser.\nFor some features it\'s possible that the Super user (aka root) permission is required.\nIn order to use the application you have to open a link to one of the supported social network.

Changelog
v0.2
-Foursquare support started
Foursquare:
User link (with id) -> User profile
Venue link -> Venue

v0.1
-Initial release
Twitter:
User link -> User profile
Facebook:
User link -> User profile
Post link -> User Profile
Message link -> List of messages (root needed)
Event -> Event (root needed)
For suggestions or ideas or if you want to collaborate send an email monossido@lorenzobraghetto.com, sources available at https://github.com/monossido/AppLink
